entry.title: 英语第一天
entry.content:
Your genetics influence how resilient you are to the cold

What makes some people more likely to shiver than others?

Some people just aren’t bothered by the cold, no matter how low the temperature dips. And the reason for this may be in a person’s genes.

Our new research shows that a common genetic variant in the skeletal muscle gene, ACTN3, makes people more resilient to cold temperatures.

你的遗传学影响你的耐寒能力

什么使一些人比其他人更容易打哆嗦？

恰恰有一群人不会烦恼于寒冷，不论温度下降到多低。原因可能在人的基因上。

我们的最新研究显示,一个普通的位于骨骼肌基因的遗传变异体，ACTN3,会使人更耐低温。

Word

  • resilient — 可迅速恢复的；有适应力的；有弹性（或弹力）的；能复原的
  • shiver — 颤抖、哆嗦、（因恐惧产生的）寒颤；碎片
  • dips — 跌落
  • the skeletal muscle gene — 骨骼肌基因
  • genetic variant — 遗传变异体
